description: A slight clerical error has doubled booked Men.com’s number one model, Johnny Rapid, for a scene with Jimmy Johnson and newcomer, Alex Adams. Instead of waiting for the director to sort out the issue, Johnny decides to take a turn getting fucked by these desperate cocks, and decide for himself who will be his next scene partner. This audition quickly turns into a hot threesome that comes with Johnny taking two big dicks in his hole at once.
title: Double Booked
